CustomField.formula: if(ispickval(b3o__Type__c, 'Inbound'), if(b3o__Contact__r.FirstName != null, LEFT(b3o__Contact__r.FirstName, 1),'') & if(b3o__Contact__r.LastName != null, LEFT(b3o__Contact__r.LastName, 1),''), if(CreatedBy.FirstName != null, LEFT(CreatedBy.FirstName, 1),'') & if(CreatedBy.LastName != null, LEFT(CreatedBy.LastName, 1),''))
CustomField.label: Message Sender Initials
